params.name: text
params.description: The text for the previous button.

params.name: href
params.description: The URL for the previous page.

params.name: title
params.description: An optional title attribute for the previous button.

params.name: current
params.description: If `true`, highlight this item as the current page.

params.name: ellipsis
params.description: Use this option if you want to specify an ellipsis at a given point between numbers. If you set this option as `true`, any other options for the item are ignored.

params.name: text
params.description: The text for the next button.

params.name: href
params.description: The URL for the next page.

params.name: title
params.description: An optional title attribute for the next button.

name: landmarkLabel
description: An optional label for the pagination region.

name: currentItemText
description: If no `items` are provided, this text will be used to indicate the current page.

name: solid
description: If `true`, use a solid background for the pagination buttons.

name: spaced
description: If `true`, add spacing between the pagination buttons and align the previous and next buttons to the extreme left and right of the component respectively.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the pagination.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the pagination.
